Normal.description: Normal font weight is used for body text and form inputs together with “Text” font family.

Medium.description: Medium font weight is used for buttons and sub headings together with “Text” font family.

Semi Bold.description: Semi bold font weight is used for headings and strong text only together with “Text” font family.

Bold.description: Bold font weight is used for headings and strong text only together with “Text” font family.

Default.description: Text font family uses a font stack that gracefully degrades to default system fonts on different platforms. Should be used for body text and form controls.

Heading.description: Gives tiny amount of negative letter spacing for the heading text.

Display-L.description: Display L font size is for marketing purposes and banners.

Display-M.description: Display M font size is for marketing purposes and banners.

Heading-2XL.description: Heading 2XL font size is used for the main heading on desktop.

Heading-XL.description: Heading XL font size is used for the main heading on tablet size.

Heading-L.description: Heading L font size is used for large sub-headings.

Heading-M.description: Heading M font size is used for the body text.

Text-XL.description: Text XL font size is used for small sub-headings.

Text-L.description: Text L font size is used for the body text.

Text-M.description: Text M font size is used for the body text.

Text-S.description: Text S is used for small text and caption.

Overline.description: Overline text is used for eyebrow.

Tight.description: This token can be used when you don’t want line height taking any extra space.

Heading.description: This is the default line height for headings.

Caption.description: This is the default line height for captions, hint texts and form errors.

Default.description: Default line-height is used for the main body text. Basically everything else except the headings and sidebar (and a few other exceptions).

Circle.description: Circle border-radius is used as icon background shape and as avatar shape.

Pill.description: This is for creating pill shaped tags and similar.

Sharp.description: Sharp border-radius resets the corners to be sharp with no rounding.

XS.description: This is extra small border radius.

M.description: This is the default border Radius.

XL.description: This is extra large border radius.
